Body:
There is a lot of easily located material online which describes stemmers or provides implementations. There's a bit of discussion of metrics for quantifying how effective they are, and I've even found an evaluation program. What I can't find anywhere is some manually tagged data for use in such evaluation.

Are there standard test data sets for English stemmers? (Test data sets for lemmatisers would obviously also serve). Are they freely available online?
Title: Are there standard test data sets for English stemmers / lemmatisers?
